privacyPage.title: PRIVACY
privacyPage.subtitle: Your privacy is our priority. Understand how we collect, use, and protect your data.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: The SomosTetra platform is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your information, in accordance with the Brazilian General Data Protection Law (LGPD - Law No. 13.709/2018).

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.intro: We use your personal data to:
items: Process your participation in votes and petitions
Calculate points and assign gamification badges
Manage the referral and invitation system
Improve our services and user experience
Comply with legal and regulatory obligations

dataStorage.title: Storage and Security
dataStorage.intro: Your data is securely stored using Supabase infrastructure, with the following security measures:
items: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
Access restricted to authorized personnel only

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.intro: According to LGPD, you have the following rights:
userRights.access: Request access to your personal data
userRights.portability: Receive your data in structured format
userRights.opposition: Object to the processing of your data

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.intro: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal data with third parties for commercial purposes. Your data may be shared only in the following situations:
items: When required by law or court order
To protect rights, property, or platform security

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.text: We use essential cookies for authentication and platform operation. These cookies are necessary to keep your session active and ensure your account security.

minors.title: Minors
minors.text: Our platform is intended for users 18 years and older. We do not intentionally collect data from minors. If you believe we have collected data from a minor, please contact us immediately.

nonprofit.title: Non-Profit Organization
nonprofit.text: SomosTetra is a non-profit NGO (Non-Governmental Organization). We never aim for profit and all our operations are focused exclusively on benefiting the community of people with tetraplegia and their supporters.

openSource.title: 100% Open Source Code
openSource.text: All source code of the SomosTetra platform is completely open and public. Anyone can audit, contribute, and verify how your data is processed.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.text: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through a notice on the platform. The date of the last update will always be indicated at the top of this page.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: To exercise your rights or clarify questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us:
contact.redirectNote: Alternative domains (soutetra.com, soutetra.org) automatically redirect to somostetra.org
contact.responseTime: We will respond to your request within 15 business days, as established by LGPD.

cta.title: Questions?
cta.text: We are here to help. Contact us if you have any questions about how we handle your data.
